Dearest, 

I thought I was at the battleground, but when I arrived, I saw moms marching to keep us safe from gun violence? Can someone tell me where the civil war is?  

Sincerely, 
Laura 

#secondcivilwarletters #FourthofJuly2018 @MomsDemand @shannonrwatts https://t.co/ZgPY60BAaN

Fun to see all these anti gun people celebrate a day won by armed citizens 

🇺🇸

Dearest,

I am okay. I was almost captured by a curly hair blonde girl with an AR-15. But she was just taking selfies with the gun so I was able to escape.

Best,

Tony
